title: North East Line maintenance on 15 & 16 Nov

updates.text: Due to intensified maintenance works, five NEL stations between NE13 Kovan & NE17 Punggol will close earlier at around 11.00pm this Fri & Sat – 15 & 16 Nov. Shuttle Bus 21 will be in operation to serve the closed stations while Service 325 will run until 12.50am.
